	<div class="entry-main">
		<div class="entry-main__inner">
												<div class="entry-main__content entry-content">
						</p>
<p>Here are 11 recent Epic EHR implementation announcements and go-lives since the end of May.</p>
<p>Sidney (Neb.) Regional Medical Center, a 25-bed acute care hospital, <a href="https://www.beckershospitalreview.com/ehrs/nebraska-hospital-selects-epic-ehr-5-notes.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener">launched </a>its Epic EHR implementation. The system is expected to go live in June 2020.</p>
<p>Columbia University Irving Medical Center <a href="https://www.beckershospitalreview.com/ehrs/columbia-u-medical-center-enlists-900-super-users-ahead-of-epic-go-live.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener">reported </a>bringing on 900 super users ahead of its go-live, scheduled for February 2020.</p>
<p>Tower Health in West Reading, Pa., <a href="https://www.beckershospitalreview.com/ehrs/tower-health-now-live-on-epic-at-5-more-hospitals.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener">implemented </a>Epic EHR at five more of its hospitals and 25 physician practices on Aug. 3. The team has completed 1,200 training classes and more than 4,500 new users were trained. </p>
<p>The University of Vermont Medical Center in Burlington <a href="https://www.beckershospitalreview.com/ehrs/u-of-vermont-seeks-to-expand-150m-epic-ehr-implementation.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener">filed </a>a proposal to add two more hospitals to its $151.7 million Epic EHR implementation. The health system aims to complete implementation by 20221.</p>
<p>Novant Health in Winston Salem, N.C., <a href="https://www.beckershospitalreview.com/ehrs/novant-health-moves-epic-ehr-to-the-cloud-3-things-to-know.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener">migrated </a>its Epic EHR system to the cloud platform from Virtustream, a Dell Technologies health IT business.</p>
<p>Carrollton, Ga.-based Tanner Health <a href="https://www.beckershospitalreview.com/ehrs/tanner-health-begins-epic-ehr-rollout-4-things-to-know.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener">launched </a>a new Epic EHR at its 40 outpatient clinics and urgent care facilities. The health system has partnered with Epic since March 2018 to implement its five hospitals in November.</p>
<p>Piedmont Columbus (Ga.) Regional <a href="https://www.beckershospitalreview.com/ehrs/piedmont-columbus-regional-now-live-on-epic-ehr.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener">launched </a>an Epic EHR at several campuses as part of a $30 million project to implement single records system at Piedmont Healthcare in Atlanta. Piedmont began installing Epic at its facilities in 2012.</p>
<p>Mohawk Valley Health System in Utica, N.Y., <a href="https://www.beckershospitalreview.com/ehrs/mohawk-valley-health-system-installs-epic-ehr.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener">deployed </a>Epic EHR at the end of June.</p>
<p>Johns Hopkins All Children’s Hospital in St. Petersburg, Fla., <a href="https://www.beckershospitalreview.com/ehrs/johns-hopkins-all-children-s-hospital-moving-to-epic-ehr.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener">transitioned </a>to an Epic EHR so it was at the same system as all other Johns Hopkins Medicine entities.</p>
<p>Baptist Health Floyd in New Albany, Ind., a 225-bed hospital, <a href="https://www.beckershospitalreview.com/ehrs/baptist-health-floyd-now-live-on-epic-ehr.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener">launched </a>the Epic EHR in June so it would be on the same system as all other hospitals in Baptist Health, which is based in Louisville, Ky.</p>
<p>Owensboro Health Muhlenberg Community Hospital <a href="https://www.beckershospitalreview.com/ehrs/kentucky-hospital-implements-2m-epic-ehr-3-things-to-know.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener">completed </a>Epic EHR implementation. Owensboro (Ky.) Health network reported the transition took 18 months and cost about $2 million.</p>
<p><em>To add a hospital or be featured in Becker’s in the future, contact Laura Dyrda at <a href="mailto:ldyrda@beckershealthcare.com" target="_parent">ldyrda@beckershealthcare.com</a>.</em></p>
<p><strong>More articles on health IT:</strong><br /><a href="https://www.beckershospitalreview.com/ehrs/4-things-epic-has-done-in-the-past-4-months.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener">3 things Epic has done in the past 4 months</a><br /><a href="https://www.beckershospitalreview.com/ehrs/4-ways-cerner-is-growing-its-innovation-efforts.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener">4 ways Cerner is growing its innovation efforts</a><br /><a href="https://www.beckershospitalreview.com/healthcare-information-technology/mercy-s-it-arm-launches-network-for-clinical-data-analytics.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener">Mercy’s IT arm launches network for clinical data, analytics</a></p>
					</div>

data.text:
Here are 11 recent Epic EHR implementation announcements and go-lives since the end of May.
Sidney (Neb.) Regional Medical Center, a 25-bed acute care hospital, [launched ](https://www.beckershospitalreview.com/ehrs/nebraska-hospital-selects-epic-ehr-5-notes.html)its Epic EHR implementation. The system is expected to go live in June 2020.
Columbia University Irving Medical Center [reported ](https://www.beckershospitalreview.com/ehrs/columbia-u-medical-center-enlists-900-super-users-ahead-of-epic-go-live.html)bringing on 900 super users ahead of its go-live, scheduled for February 2020.
Tower Health in West Reading, Pa., [implemented ](https://www.beckershospitalreview.com/ehrs/tower-health-now-live-on-epic-at-5-more-hospitals.html)Epic EHR at five more of its hospitals and 25 physician practices on Aug. 3. The team has completed 1,200 training classes and more than 4,500 new users were trained.
The University of Vermont Medical Center in Burlington [filed ](https://www.beckershospitalreview.com/ehrs/u-of-vermont-seeks-to-expand-150m-epic-ehr-implementation.html)a proposal to add two more hospitals to its $151.7 million Epic EHR implementation. The health system aims to complete implementation by 20221.
Novant Health in Winston Salem, N.C., [migrated ](https://www.beckershospitalreview.com/ehrs/novant-health-moves-epic-ehr-to-the-cloud-3-things-to-know.html)its Epic EHR system to the cloud platform from Virtustream, a Dell Technologies health IT business.
Carrollton, Ga.-based Tanner Health [launched ](https://www.beckershospitalreview.com/ehrs/tanner-health-begins-epic-ehr-rollout-4-things-to-know.html)a new Epic EHR at its 40 outpatient clinics and urgent care facilities. The health system has partnered with Epic since March 2018 to implement its five hospitals in November.
Piedmont Columbus (Ga.) Regional [launched ](https://www.beckershospitalreview.com/ehrs/piedmont-columbus-regional-now-live-on-epic-ehr.html)an Epic EHR at several campuses as part of a $30 million project to implement single records system at Piedmont Healthcare in Atlanta. Piedmont began installing Epic at its facilities in 2012.
Mohawk Valley Health System in Utica, N.Y., [deployed ](https://www.beckershospitalreview.com/ehrs/mohawk-valley-health-system-installs-epic-ehr.html)Epic EHR at the end of June.
Johns Hopkins All Children’s Hospital in St. Petersburg, Fla., [transitioned ](https://www.beckershospitalreview.com/ehrs/johns-hopkins-all-children-s-hospital-moving-to-epic-ehr.html)to an Epic EHR so it was at the same system as all other Johns Hopkins Medicine entities.
Baptist Health Floyd in New Albany, Ind., a 225-bed hospital, [launched ](https://www.beckershospitalreview.com/ehrs/baptist-health-floyd-now-live-on-epic-ehr.html)the Epic EHR in June so it would be on the same system as all other hospitals in Baptist Health, which is based in Louisville, Ky.
Owensboro Health Muhlenberg Community Hospital [completed ](https://www.beckershospitalreview.com/ehrs/kentucky-hospital-implements-2m-epic-ehr-3-things-to-know.html)Epic EHR implementation. Owensboro (Ky.) Health network reported the transition took 18 months and cost about $2 million.
To add a hospital or be featured in Becker’s in the future, contact Laura Dyrda at [ldyrda@beckershealthcare.com](mailto:ldyrda@beckershealthcare.com).
More articles on health IT:[3 things Epic has done in the past 4 months](https://www.beckershospitalreview.com/ehrs/4-things-epic-has-done-in-the-past-4-months.html)[4 ways Cerner is growing its innovation efforts](https://www.beckershospitalreview.com/ehrs/4-ways-cerner-is-growing-its-innovation-efforts.html)[Mercy’s IT arm launches network for clinical data, analytics](https://www.beckershospitalreview.com/healthcare-information-technology/mercy-s-it-arm-launches-network-for-clinical-data-analytics.html)
